Comparing the per-day RMSE scores we see some are better and some are worse than using
seven-day inputs. This may suggest beneﬁt in using the two diﬀerent sized inputs in some way,
such as an ensemble of the two approaches or perhaps a single model (e.g. a multi-headed
model) that reads the training data in diﬀerent ways.
Figure 20.2: Line Plot of RMSE per Day for Univariate LSTM with Vector Output and 14-day
Inputs.
20.7 Encoder-Decoder LSTM With Univariate Input
